name: Appraiser's Treasure
description: Magnificent jewelry and splendid antiques in Sumeru City's jewelry stores are usually contained in extremely intricate wooden boxes.\nJewelry and antiques are both expensive and non-essential items with limited sale prospects. Promising pieces are also often spoken for well in advance. With that in mind, those who can run a jewelry shop for a long time are likely already wealthy, and do not need to rely on the shop's profits to make a living...
